channel.title: CVE Feed for wponlinesupport -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wponlinesupport -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5334|2023-10-03T01:58:50.744Z -- wponlinesupport -- wp%20responsive%20header%20image%20slider
item.description: The WP Responsive header image slider plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'sp_responsiveslider' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 3.2.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
